name: part_006
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】重大告知あり！＂アニソン Night Fever!!＂【#角巻わため生誕祭2025】 [rhgRzAgYKDM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Fatal' (ファタール) by Tsunomaki Watame and Cocoa Domyoji.
Solo performance of the song 'The Brave' (勇者) by Tsunomaki Watame.
MC section where Watame reflects on the performance and mentions the VJ work.

subtitles.original: 僕の胸で震え続けている傷を撫でる手を
subtitles.english: With a hand that strokes the wound still trembling in my chest

subtitles.original: この舞台で足掻くことをやめない
subtitles.english: I won't stop struggling on this stage

subtitles.original: ただ一つのアイに近づきたい
subtitles.english: I want to get closer to that one and only "Ai"

subtitles.original: 固く定まったこの宿命
subtitles.english: This destiny that has been firmly decided

subtitles.original: あの星の光からこぼれた闇
subtitles.english: The darkness that spilled from the light of that star

subtitles.original: あなたがいないと生きていけない
subtitles.english: I can't live without you

subtitles.original: 何もかも捧げてしまっていい
subtitles.english: I'm fine with giving up everything

subtitles.original: あなたの愛がまだ足りない
subtitles.english: Your love is still not enough

subtitles.original: 欠けたものは何で埋めたらいい？
subtitles.english: What should I use to fill what's missing?

subtitles.original: 致命的、致命的、致命的な愛
subtitles.english: Fatal, fatal, fatal love

subtitles.original: 運命的、運命的、運命的な愛
subtitles.english: Fated, fated, fated love

subtitles.original: 必然的、必然的、必然的な愛
subtitles.english: Inevitable, inevitable, inevitable love

subtitles.original: 僕を見ていてね
subtitles.english: Keep your eyes on me

subtitles.original: 最愛のファタール！
subtitles.english: My beloved fatal!

subtitles.original: You're fatal
subtitles.english: You're fatal

subtitles.original: 最愛のファタール
subtitles.english: My beloved fatal

subtitles.original: まるで御伽の話
subtitles.english: Like a fairy tale

subtitles.original: 終わり迎えた証
subtitles.english: The sign that it has ended

subtitles.original: 長過ぎる旅路から
subtitles.english: From the journey that was too long

subtitles.original: 切り出した一節
subtitles.english: A single verse cut out

subtitles.original: それはかつてこの地に
subtitles.english: It was once in this land

subtitles.original: 影を落とした悪を
subtitles.english: The evil that cast a shadow

subtitles.original: 討ち取りし勇者との
subtitles.english: With the hero who struck it down

subtitles.original: 短い旅の記憶
subtitles.english: Memories of a short journey

subtitles.original: 物語は終わり
subtitles.english: The story ends

subtitles.original: 勇者は眠りにつく
subtitles.english: The hero falls into slumber

subtitles.original: 穏やかな日常を　この地に残して
subtitles.english: Leaving a peaceful daily life in this land

subtitles.original: 時の流れは無情に　人を忘れさせる
subtitles.english: The passage of time heartlessly makes people forget

subtitles.original: そこに生きた軌跡も　錆び付いていく
subtitles.english: Even the traces of living there begin to rust

subtitles.original: それでも君の　言葉も願いも勇気も
subtitles.english: Even so, your words, your wishes, and your courage

subtitles.original: 今も確かに　私の中で生きてる
subtitles.english: Are still certainly alive within me

subtitles.original: 同じ道を選んだ
subtitles.english: We chose the same path

subtitles.original: それだけだったはずなのに
subtitles.english: That was all it was supposed to be, and yet

subtitles.original: いつからかどうして
subtitles.english: Since when and why

subtitles.original: 頬を伝う涙の理由を
subtitles.english: The reason for the tears streaming down my cheeks

subtitles.original: もっと知りたいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to know more about it

subtitles.original: 今更だって　共に歩んだ旅路を辿れば
subtitles.english: Even if it's too late, if I retrace the journey we walked together

subtitles.original: そこに君はいなくとも　きっと見つけられる
subtitles.english: Even if you're not there, I'll surely be able to find it

subtitles.original: 物語は続く
subtitles.english: The story continues

subtitles.original: 一人の旅へと発つ
subtitles.english: Setting off on a journey alone

subtitles.original: 立ち寄る街で出会う人の
subtitles.english: In the people I meet in the towns I stop at

subtitles.original: 記憶の中に残る君は
subtitles.english: You, who remains in their memories

subtitles.original: 相も変わらずお人好しで
subtitles.english: Are as much of a softie as ever

subtitles.original: 格好つけてばかりだね
subtitles.english: And just always trying to look cool, aren't you?

subtitles.original: あちらこちらに作ったシンボルは
subtitles.english: The symbols you made here and there

subtitles.original: 勝ち取った平和の証
subtitles.english: Are the proof of the peace you won

subtitles.original: それすら未来でいつか
subtitles.english: So that even in the future someday

subtitles.original: 私が一人にならないように
subtitles.english: I won't be alone

subtitles.original: あの旅を思い出せるように
subtitles.english: So that I can remember that journey

subtitles.original: 残された目印
subtitles.english: A mark left behind

subtitles.original: まるで御伽の話
subtitles.english: Like a fairy tale

subtitles.original: 終わり迎えた証
subtitles.english: The sign that it has ended

subtitles.original: 私を変えた出会い
subtitles.english: The encounter that changed me

subtitles.original: 百分の一の旅路
subtitles.english: One-hundredth of a journey

subtitles.original: 君の勇気をいつか　風がさらって
subtitles.english: Even if the wind carries away your courage someday

subtitles.original: 誰の記憶から消えてしまっても
subtitles.english: And it disappears from everyone's memory

subtitles.original: 私が未来に連れて行くから
subtitles.english: I will take it with me into the future

subtitles.original: 君の手を取った
subtitles.english: I took your hand

subtitles.original: あの日全て始まった
subtitles.english: Everything started that day

subtitles.original: くだらなくて思わずふっと
subtitles.english: So silly that I can't help but

subtitles.original: 笑ってしまうような
subtitles.english: Suddenly burst out laughing

subtitles.original: ありふれた時間が　今も眩しい
subtitles.english: That commonplace time is still dazzling even now

subtitles.original: 知りたいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to know

subtitles.original: 今更だって振り返ると
subtitles.english: Even if it's too late, looking back

subtitles.original: そこにはいつでも
subtitles.english: There you always are

subtitles.original: 優しく微笑みかける君がいるから
subtitles.english: Smiling gently at me

subtitles.original: 新たな旅の始まりは
subtitles.english: The beginning of a new journey is

subtitles.original: 君が守り抜いたこの地に
subtitles.english: In this land that you protected to the end

subtitles.original: 芽吹いた命と共に
subtitles.english: Together with the life that has sprouted

subtitles.original: 勇者、いい曲だったね〜。
subtitles.english: "The Brave," that was a great song, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: うん。
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: VJとかもね、あ、VJっていうのは
subtitles.english: Even the VJ... Oh, by VJ

subtitles.original: この後ろのMVのことなんだけど。
subtitles.english: I mean the MV behind me.

subtitles.original: VJとかもね、こだわってみたので、
subtitles.english: Since I was really particular about the VJ as well,

subtitles.original: ぜひぜひ、いっぱい見てもらいたいな。
subtitles.english: I'd really, really love for you all to watch it a lot.

subtitles.original: アーカイブとかもね。
subtitles.english: In the archives and such.

subtitles.original: あ、まだ終わってないけどね！
subtitles.english: Oh, it's not over yet, though!

subtitles.original: いや、ゲストさんもいっぱい来てくれて嬉しいよ〜！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy so many guests came as well!

subtitles.original: ありがと〜！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: はぁ。
subtitles.english: *Sigh*

subtitles.original: なんかさ、今までのセトリさ、
subtitles.english: You know, the setlist so far,

subtitles.original: あの、平成の...
subtitles.english: it's been like Heisei era...
